alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Jefferson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 04 at 2:27AM CDT until April 04 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND DRY FUELS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 008, 009, 010, 020, 021, 022, 023, 034, 035, 036, 037, 038, AND 054... The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 10 AM this morning to 11 PM CDT this evening. * WIND...Sustained winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Southwest winds during the afternoon switch to the west-northwest during the evening behind a cold front. * HUMIDITY...Relative humidity falling into the 20 to 25 percent range during the late afternoon and early evening. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
